00567         if (D[i][j]>MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
00568             //BX for the Eq.Pac.:
00569             //BX if (i>=128 && i<=132 && j>=91 && j<=101 && k>=8) {
00570             //BX if (i>=128 && i<=132 && j>=91 && j<=101 && k==0) {
00571             //BX for the Central NPac.:
00572             //BX            if (i>=128 && i<=132 && j>=151 && j<=155 && k>=8) {
00573             //BX for south of Greenland: if (i>=258 && i<=262 && j>=161 && j<=165 && k==0) {
00574 
00575 //          if (j>=0 && j<=NYMEM-1 && i>=90 && i<=100 && k==0) {
00576             if (i>=0 && i<=NXMEM-1 && j>=80 && j<=90 && k==0) {
00577                 age[k][i][j] = 1.;
00578                 tr[m][k][i][j] = 1.;
00579             } else {
00580                 age[k][i][j] = 0.;
00581                 tr[m][k][i][j] = 0.;
00582             }
00583         } else {
00584             age[k][i][j] = misval;
00585             tr[m][k][i][j] = misval;
00586         }
00587 
00588       }
00589     }
00590   }
00591 #    else  // AGE2
00592     printf("initialize tracer from netcdf file\n\n");
00593 
00594     //  read_age_tracer_init();
00595     for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
00596         for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
00597             for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00598                 if (D[i][j]>MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
00599                     age[k][i][j] = age_init[k][i][j];  /* in years */
00600                     tr[m][k][i][j] = age_init[k][i][j]*365.0*86400.0; /* in seconds */
00601                 } else {
00602                     age[k][i][j] = misval;
00603                     tr[m][k][i][j] = misval;
00604                 }
00605             }
00606         }
00607     }
00608 #    endif  // AGE2
00609 #   endif  // AGE1
00610 #  endif  // AGEEXP

00618             for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {

00622                 u[k][i][j] = 0.0;

00632           for (k=0; k<NZ; k++) {
00633             age[k][i][j] = age_init[k][i][j];  /* in years */
00634             tr[m][k][i][j] = age_init[k][i][j]*365.0*86400.0; /* in seconds */
00635           }
00636         } else {
00637           for (k=0; k<NZ; k++) {

00640           }

00889 #ifdef MERGED_ML
00890     //BX merge 1st-2nd and 3rd-4th layer for auxiliary fields
00891     for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
00892         for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
00893             for (k=0;k<=2;k=k+2) {
00894 # ifdef OXY18
00895               o18[k][i][j]       = (o18[k][i][j]*h[k][i][j]+
00896                                     o18[k+1][i][j]*h[k+1][i][j])/
00897                 (h[k][i][j] + h[k+1][i][j]);
00898             o18[k+1][i][j]     = o18[k][i][j];
00899 # endif
00900 # ifdef DIC
00901             dic[k][i][j]       = (dic[k][i][j]*h[k][i][j]+
00902                                   dic[k+1][i][j]*h[k+1][i][j])/
00903               (h[k][i][j] + h[k+1][i][j]);
00904             dic[k+1][i][j]     = dic[k][i][j];
00905 
00906             alk[k][i][j]       = (alk[k][i][j]*h[k][i][j]+
00907                                   alk[k+1][i][j]*h[k+1][i][j])/
00908               (h[k][i][j] + h[k+1][i][j]);
00909             alk[k+1][i][j]     = alk[k][i][j];
00910 # endif
00911 # ifdef AGE
00912             age[k][i][j]       = (age[k][i][j]*h[k][i][j]+
00913                                   age[k+1][i][j]*h[k+1][i][j])/
00914               (h[k][i][j] + h[k+1][i][j]);
00915             age[k+1][i][j]     = age[k][i][j];
00916 # endif
00917 # ifdef CFC
00918             cfc11[k][i][j]       = (cfc11[k][i][j]*h[k][i][j]+
00919                                     cfc11[k+1][i][j]*h[k+1][i][j])/
00920               (h[k][i][j] + h[k+1][i][j]);
00921             cfc11[k+1][i][j]     = cfc11[k][i][j];
00922 
00923             cfc12[k][i][j]       = (cfc12[k][i][j]*h[k][i][j]+
00924                                     cfc12[k+1][i][j]*h[k+1][i][j])/

00929 # ifdef SF6

00932               (h[k][i][j] + h[k+1][i][j]);

00934 
00935 # endif
00936 // end ashao
00937 
00938 # ifdef INERT
00939             inert1[k][i][j]       = (inert1[k][i][j]*h[k][i][j]+
00940                                      inert1[k+1][i][j]*h[k+1][i][j])/
00941               (h[k][i][j] + h[k+1][i][j]);

00953     merge_ml_tr();

00956     /* zonal, meridional re-entrance    */
00957     for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) {
00958         for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00959             for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
00960                 tr[m][k][0][j] = tr[m][k][nx-1][j];
00961                 tr[m][k][1][j] = tr[m][k][nx][j];       
00962                 tr[m][k][nx+1][j] = tr[m][k][2][j];
00963                 tr[m][k][nx+2][j] = tr[m][k][3][j];
00964             }
00965         }
00966         for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00967             for (i=2;i<=nx;i++) {
00968                 tr[m][k][363-i][ny+1] = tr[m][k][i][ny];
00969                 tr[m][k][363-i][ny+2] = tr[m][k][i][ny-1];
00970             }
00971         }
00972     }
